title: Which movie or album is the song 'Mere Rashke Qamar' from? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mere Rashke-e-Qamar is a beautiful Punjabi Love song of the legend Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan Saheb. It is a Qawwali style song with minimal music of harmonium, clapping and tabla, backed by Nusrat Saheb’s amazing voice of course. Album name in ‘Sufi Reloaded’ (2017) released by Saregama India. Album : Sufi Reloaded (2017) Song : Mere Rashke Qamar Remix Singer : Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan Label : Saregama India Ltd Original and old song & video is on YouTube uploaded by youtuber Akhlaq Hussain:-  This song is recently composed by Pakistani singer and musician Junaid Asghar and telecasted on Pakistani TV programme Nayee Subha. Junaid also uploaded this song on his YouTube channel “Junaid Asghar”. Anyone uploaded this song with Film Raees Trailer scenes and Singer title as Arijit Singh on YouTube and it gone viral. It is not a part of film Raees nor sung by Arijit Singh as claimed. Song composed and sung by Junaid Asghar is this one:-  And fake video uploaded on YouTube with title Arijit Singh is this one:-  Another fake version is this one:-  Almost 10000 versions of this song is on YouTube.

Q. What is the name of the Bollywood movie which has the song "Mere Rashke Qamar"? A. Badshaho. Answers to these kind of questions can be obtained a LOT faster by just googling them rather than asking them on Quora and actually waiting for someone to answer.
